Fumex

Contains logic for controlling the machine fume extraction

Functions
TurnOn
call Fumex.Turnon()

Turn on fume extraction

TurnOff
call Fumex.TurnOff()

Turn off fume extraction

IsOn
call Fumex.isOn(
&StateIsOn
)

Query the state of the fume extraction system Response Parameters: &StateIsOn - '1' if the fumex is currently running, or '0' if it is not

IsFlowOK
call Fumex.IsFlowOK(
&flowOK
)

Test the flow of the fume extraction system.  This method is generally called by background operations and is not intended for customer use.

Response Parameters
&flowOK

'YES' if the flow is OK, otherwise 'NO'

SetTimeoutInSeconds
call Fumex.SetTimeoutInSeconds(
value
)

Set the amount of time to wait while the fumex is turning on before emitting an error

Parameters
value

the amount of time, in seconds, to wait for the fume extraction system to come to pressure
